item.title: Overloaded Bus Travego Mod Pack 1.43 TO 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 19, 2025

Overloaded Bus Travego Mod Pack 1.43 TO 1.55 ETS2

Overloaded bus mod with heavy load in roof.
Working on ETS2 1.43 TO 1.55

Travego Pack mod release (JETBUS HD MUHAMMAD ANNAS
NON-HD EDIT SHANDY AKBAR NUGROHO
EDIT TRAVEGO NEW ARMADA
(AVANT GARDE-GRAND ARISTO-ARISTOVO) Convert ETS2 by M Husaini Ihsan

Bus Body Options
Jetbus HD
Jetbus 2
Marcopolo AC & Non AC
Marcopolo Open Door
Setra Smile AC & Non AC

Credits: Ihsan Al-Husain Mehammed

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Fiat 210 Truck v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 19, 2025

Fiat 210 Truck v1.0 ETS2

The Fiat 210 was a heavy-duty truck produced in the 1970s, notable for its role in the Brazilian market. After Fiat acquired a stake in the Brazilian truck manufacturer FNM (Fábrica Nacional de Motores), they launched the Fiat 210 S in 1974.
Engine and Power: It was equipped with a 13-liter engine that produced around 240 horsepower, a considerable amount of power for its time.
Legacy: The truck was a successor to the FNM 210, a popular model in Brazil. It played an important part in the transition of FNM’s operations to Fiat, which eventually led to the formation of Iveco’s presence in South America.

Credits: FERNANDO GAMER

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: Scania 111S 1987 ETS2 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 19, 2025

Scania 111S 1987 ETS2 1.55 ETS2

The request “Scania 111S 1987 ETS2 1.55” is about a popular mod for the video game Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2), not a real-world truck model. The Scania 111S is a classic “Jacaré” (alligator) model from Brazil, and its addition to the game as a mod is highly sought after by players, especially those in the Brazilian ETS2 community.

Here’s a breakdown of what that mod request means:
The Scania 111S “Jacaré”
The Scania 111S is a legendary truck, particularly in South America, known for its iconic, long-nosed design that earned it the nickname “Jacaré” (alligator) in Brazil. The mod brings a detailed digital recreation of this classic vehicle into the game, allowing players to drive it and customize it as they would with a modern truck.

The “1987” and “1.55 ETS2”
1987 refers to the specific year of the truck model the mod is based on, representing its vintage and classic aesthetic.
1.55 ETS2 is the version number of the Euro Truck Simulator 2 game that the mod is designed to be compatible with. Game developers regularly update ETS2, and these updates can break mods. Therefore, mod creators must release new versions of their mods to work with the latest game patch.

What the Mod Typically Includes
A high-quality Scania 111S mod for ETS2 usually offers a lot of content beyond just the truck model itself:
Detailed 3D Model: A meticulously crafted exterior and interior that captures the retro feel of the 111S. This often includes period-correct dashboards, steering wheels, and textures.
Customization Options : Players can usually modify the truck with a variety of parts, such as different chassis configurations (e.g., 4×2, 6×2), exhaust pipes (including vertical “straight pipes”), paint jobs, and accessories like mudflaps and light bars.
Realistic Sound Pack: The mod will often come with a custom sound set that accurately reproduces the distinct engine sound of the old Scania, adding to the immersion.
Custom Physics : A unique handling and physics model designed to feel like a vintage, heavy-duty truck, different from the modern trucks in the base game.
Compatibility : The mod is specifically built to work with the specified game version (in this case, 1.55) and is often compatible with other popular mods, like custom maps or trailers.

Credits: RAFAEL ARES

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: MB LP 331 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 19, 2025

MB LP 331 v1.0 ETS2

Modders go to great lengths to make these old trucks feel authentic and highly customizable. A good MB LP 331 mod typically includes:
Detailed Models: The mod will feature a high-quality 3D model of both the exterior and the interior. This includes the classic, spartan dashboard, manual transmission lever, and other period-correct details that capture the truck’s old-school charm.
Realistic Sounds : One of the most important aspects of a classic truck mod is the sound. It will often have a custom sound pack that faithfully reproduces the distinctive roar of the original diesel engine and the characteristic air brakes.
Extensive Customization: Players can customize their virtual truck to a high degree. This includes different chassis configurations (like 4×2 or 6×2), engine options, and a variety of accessories like custom bumpers, different exhaust pipes, and unique paint jobs that reflect the truck’s history.
Unique Driving Experience: The mod often includes a custom physics model to simulate how an older, heavier truck would handle compared to the modern ones in the base game. This means it might feel less powerful and require more careful driving.

Credits: NEYMAR JR

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
